# UITextWritingDirection

**Type Alias**

The writing direction of the text for the language.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias UITextWritingDirection = NSWritingDirection
```

## Discussion

Constants of this type are returned from the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextInput/baseWritingDirection(for:in:)] method and are used as arguments of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextInput/setBaseWritingDirection(_:for:)] method.

## Deprecated

- **Style dictionary keys**: A dictionary that contains properties that define text style characteristics.
